house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1985 has 3 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Gas logs, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage DoorOpener, Great Room, Intercom System, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights,Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
